CHAU ANH TUAN  
1  
Chau Anh Tuan 
Systems Administrator 
Phone: (+84) 388137900 | Email: chauanhtuandl@gmail.com 
Address: 219/16 Ngo Tat To Street, 22 Ward, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City. 
THE DEGREE OF ENGINEER 
INDUSTRIAL UNIVERSITY OF 
 HO CHI MINH CITY 
2011 
GPA: 2.7/4 
MCSA 2008 
Nhat Nghe Education JSC,  
Ho Chi Minh

INDUSTRIAL UNIVERSITY OF  
HO CHI MINH CITY 
2014 
Education 
Company Name: VietCredit (2018 – Present) 
Job Description: Build platform on RHEL, AWS, Build server monitor Zabbix, network monitor PRTG, 
Build monitor log, Vsphere ESXI, Backup data and OS, Ansible, NTP, Postfix, Elastic stack, Splunk, …. 
Project: Monitor Server – Network, Migration Domain Controler, Migration Mail Exchange to Office 365, 
Log analytic, Mail replay, Gitlab. 
Setup, Configure and maintenance: 
- Linux (Ubuntu, Centos, RHEL): DNS, DHCP, NTP, LDAP, Service: Web server (Apache, Nginx), 
Database (MariaDB, Postgresql, Redis, …), Load balancer (HAProxy, Nginx, Keepalive),… 
- AWS: S3, EC2, RDS, VPC, Route53, EKS, … 
- Container: Docker, Dockerfile, Docker compose, Docker Swarm, Kubernetes,… 
- DevOps: Gitlab, Jenkins, Ansible, … 
- Windows: Migrate Domain controler, VPN, AD, DHCP, DNS, Migrate Exchange to office 365. 
- Vmware: Vmware Vsphere, Vcenter. 
- Zabbix, PRTG monitor: Config Monitor Server using agent, Monitor server using script, Monitor 
network, Monitor database server,…. Config mintor via SNMP, auto monitor Vmware ESXI, monitor 
multi site via proxy, send alert to email, telegram and sms. 
Experience 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
CHAU ANH TUAN  
2  
- ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana): setup and config ELK with redis and nginx. 
- Splunk: Configure analytic log and monitor server (Windows, Linux),  network device, …. 
- Backup: Setup and config bacula backup and restore on linux and windows. 
- Other: Config auto recoding command Jump – Host, Fail2ban,… 
Script written:  
- Bash Script, Python script, Powershell script on Windows and Linux 
Troubleshoot & Other:  
- OS, Monitor Server, error checking, export report systems, analytic log, … 
Company Name: Hoa Sen Group (2016 – 2018) 
Job Description: Build platform on AIX for Oracle ERP, Build server monitor Zabbix, Set up network 
monitor PRTG, Build monitor log, Vsphere, Backup data and OS, Technical support,... 
Project: ERP Oracle EBS, Monitor Server – Network. 
Setup, Configure and maintenance: 
- Linux (Ubuntu, Centos, AIX): DNS, DHCP, NTP, LDAP, Web server (Apache, Nginx), Database 
(MariaDB, Postgresql, Redis, …), load balancer Rsync, Lsync, Keepalive, Ossec, RCDev. 
- Vmware: Vmware Vsphere, Vcenter. 
- Zabbix monitor: Config Monitor Server using agent, Monitor server using script, Monitor network, 
Monitor database server, …, Config mintor via SNMP, Config auto monitor Vmware ESXI, 
Configure monitor multi site via proxy, configure send alert to email and sms. 
- ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana): setup and config ELK used redis and nginx. 
- Backup: Setup and config bacula backup and restore on linux and windows. Setup and config Tivoli 
Storage Manager for System Backup and Recovery 
- HelpDesk tool: setup and config “manageengine servicedesk plus” for 50 techinician and more 3000 
user. Config SLA, Service catalog, Query report, …. 
- Other: Config auto recoding command Jump – Host, Fail2ban, Backup mksysb on AIX, Replication 
SQL, Pgppool, Repmgr Postgresql, … 
Script written:  
- Bash Script, Python script, Powershell script on Windows and Linux 
Troubleshoot & Other: 
- OS, Monitor Server, error checking, export report systems, analytic log, … 
Company Name: HHD Group (2014 – 2016) 
Job Description: Set up a Windows server, Linux, Vsphere, Cisco basic network configuration, Technical 
support, systems implementation manager printer, monitor server, system VoiP ... 
Script written: Powershell script, shell script and python script on Windows and Linux 
Configure: Bacuala backup, Ossec, Rcdev, Nginx, Zabbix, Replication SQL, Load balancing web server and 
database, Rsync, Lsync, Keepalive, Pgppool, Repmgr Postgresql, BDR-Postgresql, FreePBX Voip, Windows 
Domain Controler,… 
Key Skills 
Backup (Tivoli, Bacula, …) 
Web Server 
Cloud (AWS, …) 
Databases (MS SQL, MySQL, Redis,…) 
Database synchronization 
Log Management (ELK, Splunk, …) 
Automation (Jenkins, Ansible, …)  
Independent work and teamwork  
VMWare 
Linux (Centos Ubuntu, RHEL…)  
IBM system P 
IBM AIX 
MS Windows Server 
Network Service 
Knowledge of Security 
Script (Python, Bash, Powershell, …) 
Monitor Systems and Network   
VOIP                                                                     
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
CHAU ANH TUAN  
3
